name: Small Tote Bag
description: These cute bags are perfect for when you need to make a quick run to the store or just want to look fashionable. Each bag measures 13 1/2 x 12.

name: Mr. Right & Mrs. Always Right Mug Pair
description:
These great hand-painted mugs are perfect for any engagement, bridal shower, wedding, anniversary, or for yourself!

This is a SET of white ceramic mugs that have been hand-painted with "Mr. Right" and other "Mrs. Always Right".

Each set of mugs can be customized on the back or the bottom of the mug with a date or name at no additional cost. Please provide what you would like included on the back or the bottom in the "Notes to Seller" section at checkout. If nothing is provided, it will be shipped blank.

Because of the hand-painted nature of this product, each mug may vary from the picture shown. This mug is top-rack dishwasher safe but hand washing is recommended to protect the finish.

name: Hand Painted Picture Frame
description:
Showcase what you love in these beautiful one-of-a-kind hand-painted picture frames. All you have to do is add your favorite picture and display! See frame sizes in options below. 

Because of the hand-painted nature of this product, each frame may vary from the picture shown.

options.name: Palm Trees with Flowers Frame (8 1/2 x 6 3/4)

name: Hand Painted Jewelry Box
description:
These beautifully hand-painted boxes are perfect to store your precious goods. Each box measures 7 3/4" by 2" deep (1" deep on inside). 

Because of the hand-painted nature of this product, each box may vary from the picture shown.

name: Leaf Mug
description:
This beautifully hand-painted mug is full of leafy goodness! 

Because of the hand-painted nature of this product, each mug may vary from the picture shown. This mug is top-rack dishwasher safe but hand washing is recommended to protect the finish.

name: Simple Chore Board
description: Need a way to organize the to-do list for you or your kiddie? This simple 11x14 magnetic chore board just the tool! You'll feel accomplished as you move the chores from "To Do" to "Done"! Frame color, name, and up to 8 chores are customizable or 6 chores and daily schedule.

name: "Always" Mug
description: From my favorite line, in my favorite book comes the inspiration for this hand-painted cappuccino mug and is perfect for any Harry Potter fan. Dumbledore asks, "Lily... after all this time?" and Snape's response is "Always."

name: "Soft Kitty" Mug
description:
Perfect for when you're sick, make a cup of your favorite beverage and sing "Soft Kitty" made popular by Sheldon on The Big Bang Theory. 

Because of the hand-painted nature of this product, each mug may vary from the picture shown. This mug is top-rack dishwasher safe but hand washing is recommended to protect the finish.

name: "Bazinga" Mug
description:
Who doesn't love good ol' Sheldon from the Big Bang Theory! This hand-painted mug captures all that we love about Sheldon and his humor. 

Because of the hand-painted nature of this product, each mug may vary from the picture shown. This mug is top-rack dishwasher safe but hand washing is recommended to protect the finish.

name: Tea Time Mug
description:
Relax with a cup of tea and your new favorite tea time mug. This mug is hand-painted and includes a little heart on the inside of the mug. 

Because of the hand-painted nature of this product, each mug may vary from the picture shown. This mug is top-rack dishwasher safe but hand washing is recommended to protect the finish.

name: Wine Bottle Decor
description: If you're looking for something a little unique for the kitchen, look no further. These unique, hand-painted wine bottles are perfect to add the special touch to your home.

name: Pair of Glitter Wine Glasses
description: Get ready for your next shindig with this lovely pair of glitter wine glasses available in today's trendy color combos! Don't see a color combo that works for you? Visit our Custom Creations page to order your own personalized pair of glitter wine glasses.

name: Happy Birthday Banner
description: These banners are perfect for any birthday celebration you're having. Customize the colors to match your theme. Each banner will have the phrase "Happy Birthday". An age can be added if desired. If you wish to add a name as well, there is an additional $5.00 cost.

name: Thank You Card Collection
description: The Thank You Card Collection features twenty-five handmade cards (envelopes included) that are perfect for saying thank you during any occasion. Images shown are samples. Due to the handmade nature of these cards, colors and styles vary.

name: Special Occasions Card Collection
description: This Special Occasions Card Collection features twenty-five (25) unique handmade cards (envelopes included) that are perfect for those once-in-a-lifetime moments. This collection includes five anniversary cads, five wedding cards, five baby cards, five congratulations cards, and five graduation cards. Images shown are samples. Due to the handmade nature of these cards, colors and styles vary.

name: Holiday Card Collection
description: The Holiday Card Collection features twenty-five unique handmade cards (envelopes included) that are perfect for the holiday season. This collection includes Holiday, Christmas, and New Years cards. Images shown are samples. Due to the handmade nature of these cards, colors and styles vary.

name: Happy Birthday Card Collection
description: The Happy Birthday Card Collection features twenty-five unique handmade cards (envelopes included) that are perfect for any birthday that you are celebrating. Images shown are samples. Due to the handmade nature of these cards, colors and styles vary.

name: All Occassion Card Collection
description: The All Occasion Card Collection features twenty-five unique handmade cards (envelopes included) that are perfect for those everyday moments that call for something special. This collection includes five birthday cards, five thank you cards, five sympathy cards, five get well soon cards, and five any occasion cards. Images shown are samples. Due to the handmade nature of these cards, colors and styles vary.

name: Pair of Chalkboard Mugs
description: Leaving a message for your loved ones in the morning just got easier - write it on their morning cup of coffee. These set of two, dishwasher safe mugs are the perfect addition to your kitchen. Pair come in cappuccino, round or square. (Cappuccino pictured)

name: Set of 4 Coasters
description: Handmade and one-of-a-kind these set of 4 coasters are styled to match any decor. Available in a variety of styles.

name: Baby Onesie "Cupcakes"
description: These Baby Onesie "Cupcakes" are the perfect unique gift for an expecting or new mother! The set of four "cupcakes" includes four 0-3 month onesies for baby and 2 pairs of coordinating socks.

name: Sweet Treats Cafe Painting
description: Grab a sweet bite to eat in thie pastry cafe inspired handpainted artwork. Measures 8x10.

name: Cat Atop A Fence Painting
description: This fun and unique artwork is handpainted and features a white tabby on a nice spring day. Measures 8x10

name: Morning Cup of Joe WordArt Painting
description: This 8x10 WordArt Painting is inspired by the local coffee house. Pull up a chair and enjoy that latte with this unique piece of art.

name: Garden WordArt Painting
description: Plant the seed and watch it grow with words from your garden on this 8X10 spring floral canvas.

name: Cat's Meow WordArt Painting
description: This 8x10 painting is for the cat lover in you. Cat inspired words sit with a black tabby looking on.

name: Baby WordArt Painting
description: Perfect for a baby's room, this WordArt painting has baby inspired wording on a baby block background.

name: Button Tree Paintings
description: These unique 8x10 Button Tree Paintings will strike up a cnversation the next time you have company. Each tree is hand painted and buttons are added individually to create a one-of-a-kind piece of art.

name: 7″ Dot Vase
description: These unique 7" Vases with rasied dots is perfect for adding that pop of color to your home! Comes in a variety of colors.

name: Hey Diddle Diddle Set of 4 Paintings
description: Hey Diddle Diddle, the Cat and the Fiddle... who doesn't remember this nursery rhyme. This set of four 5x7 paintings with fabric covered edges are perfect for your little ones room or as a gift for expecting parents.

name: Curious Cat Painting
description: Curiouser and curiouser. This nosy cat painted on a 5x7 canvas is perfect for cat lovers everywhere.

name: Cherry Blossoms Painting
description: Experience the Cherry Blossoms in your home all year long with this unique 5x7 painting with "3-D" blossoms.

name: Definition of Love WordArt
description: How do you describe love? With this piece of art! Learn the meaning of love with this 12x12 Definition of Love on canvas.

name: Hippity Hop Easter Bunny 10x8 Painting
description: Poor Mr. Easter Bunny is trying hard to protect his eggs! This beautifully hand-painted canvas is perfect for any kids room. Measures 10x8.

name: Three Women Hand Painted Canvas
description:
Hand-Painted in Ghana, Africa, this beautiful canvas depicts three women on their way home from gathering water. Measures approximately 11x24. 

Creations By Sasha partners with Sankofa International, Inc., a non-profit organization that has been helping Africa’s needy since 1993. 10% of each Sankofa Creations piece sold is donated directly back to Sankofa, which is given directly to African artists in Ghana to help them and their families become self-sustaining.

name: Giraffes Hand Painted Canvas
description:
Hand-Painted in Ghana, Africa, this canvas depicts two beautiful giraffes intertwined. Measures approximately 11x24.

Creations By Sasha partners with Sankofa International, Inc., a non-profit organization that has been helping Africa’s needy since 1993. 10% of each Sankofa Creations piece sold is donated directly back to Sankofa, which is given directly to African artists in Ghana to help them and their families become self-sustaining.

name: Farmers in the Field Hand Painted Canvas
description:

Creations By Sasha partners with Sankofa International, Inc., a non-profit organization that has been helping Africa’s needy since 1993. 10% of each Sankofa Creations piece sold is donated directly back to Sankofa, which is given directly to African artists in Ghana to help them and their families become self-sustaining.

name: African Drums Hand Painted Canvas
description:
Hand-Painted in Ghana Africa, this canvas features a beautiful array of African drums. Measures approximately 11x24.

Creations By Sasha partners with Sankofa International, Inc., a non-profit organization that has been helping Africa’s needy since 1993. 10% of each Sankofa Creations piece sold is donated directly back to Sankofa, which is given directly to African artists in Ghana to help them and their families become self-sustaining.

name: Chicken Coup Hand Painted Canvas
description:
Hand-Painted in Ghana, Africa on canvas. Measures approximately 11x24. 

Creations By Sasha partners with Sankofa International, Inc., a non-profit organization that has been helping Africa’s needy since 1993. 10% of each Sankofa Creations piece sold is donated directly back to Sankofa, which is given directly to African artists in Ghana to help them and their families become self-sustaining.
